full_summary:
## Gibbs Report
### Tender Report: Airbus Helicopter Component Repair and Overhaul
- **Tender Reference Number**: WS3744601880-Doc3849419242
- **Publication Date**: February 9, 2023
- **Closing Date**: March 14, 2023, at 14:00 EDT
- **Status**: Cancelled
- **Category**: Service (SRV)
- **Method of Procurement**: Open and Competitive
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Location of Delivery**: Canada
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services
- **End User Entity**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
- **Brief Description**: The RCMP requires repair and overhaul services for components installed on its fleet of Airbus helicopters.

**Note**: 
- This tender was cancelled due to an amendment to the closing time of the bid submission deadline.
- All supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by 14h00 EDT on March 14, 2023.
- Late submission will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

Further Details
- To find more information, please go to the Discovery announcement URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15263138?extsite=MTUyNjMxMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15263138?extsite=MTUyNjMxMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
- Contact information for the contracting entity can be found on the Ariba website or through the Ministry of Public Works and Government Services (Canada).

The above entry presents the rewritten text about the government tender announcement. The rewritten version presents the information in a more professional manner, with a clear and concise format. This makes the information easier to scan and understand.

* Removed redundant and redundant information

* Improved formatting and bullet points to make information clearer.
* Clarified that bid submission deadline has been canceled
